Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SweetSpot Diabetes Data Management Service, a software system for the management, review, and reporting of blood glucose meter data in clinical settings.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in clinical settings by patients and healthcare professionals to assist in the review, analysis, and evaluation of blood glucose test results as an accessory to blood glucose meters with data interface capabilities.
